Two Gerald Butler films in two days .... and n either of them were good. This is the sequel to Olympus Has Fallen which I fairly enjoyed. However watch ing this movie made me appreciate what director Antoine Fuqua brought to Olympus. Because he didn t direct this and it shows. Some of the editing choices were very questionable. When all the chaos starts happening it s fun in a mindless way But it doesn't make sense. There wasn t any built up like there was in the first one And that takes away from the tension of the moment. There was one awesome long take building infiltration scene that was pretty neat But th a t's j ust one scene near the end. It just feels like another sequel that was made to cash in from the success of the first movie.
